settings.title: iTunes settings
settings.intro: Before Homey can control iTunes we need to pair it with iTunes. Read the manual for instructions.

manual.manual:
Before Homey can control iTunes we need to pair it with iTunes. Click on the "Request pairing code" button to start the pairing process. After clicking the button there should now appear a icon in iTunes which indicates that Homey wants to pair. Click on this icon and iTunes will ask for a pincode, enter anything you like. After entering a pincode the pairing process is complete.

Official Apple Manual
